LanguageData.Plant_AridGrass_Westerado.label: arid grass
LanguageData.Plant_AridGrass_Westerado.description: Wild arid grass. Grows anywhere arid that has minimally fertile ground.
LanguageData.Plant_PricklyPear_Westerado.label: prickly pear
LanguageData.Plant_PricklyPear_Westerado.description: Tangled, thorny, woody shoots covered with leaves. Prickly pear grow in clusters, and slow down anyone moving over them.
LanguageData.Plant_Senecio_Westerado.label: senecio
LanguageData.Plant_Senecio_Westerado.description: A smaller flower with daisy flowers. Stores water in its leaves.
LanguageData.Plant_SpinySpurge_Westerado.label: spiny spurge
LanguageData.Plant_SpinySpurge_Westerado.description: A spiny little bush with pretty yellow flowers.
LanguageData.Plant_AridBush_Westerado.label: arid bush
